 Game Notes
 ~~~~~~~~~~
 The defining city simulation is back! Create the city you desire and make the
 choices that shape your city and power the Sims within it. Every decision,
 big or small, has real consequences. Invest in heavy industry and your economy
 will soar - but at the expense of your Sims health as pollution spreads.
 Implement green technology and improve your Sims lives while risking higher
 taxes and unemployment. Team up with your friends to solve global challenges
 launch a space shuttle, reduce carbon emissions, or build magnificent wonders.

 Install Notes
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 1. Extract RARs
 2. Install the game
 3. Copy crack
 4. Run the game as administrator
 5. Have fun!

 The game requires Microsoft Visual C++ runtimes. Install them before playing.

 Razor 1911 Greetings
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 To all our friends!
